abstract: A rogue program on Android mobile phones in Russia appears to be a simple media player but secretly sends text messages to premium phone numbers.
snippet: A rogue program on Android mobile phones in Russia appears to be a simple media player but secretly sends text messages to premium phone numbers.
lead_paragraph: The adage “Be careful what you wish for” has a modern-day counterpart: “Be careful what you download.” Especially on your mobile phone.

headline.main: Malware Infection Hits Russian Android Phones
